page.title: 14CLUBS-LILLESHALL,CH. ASTON
page.content: All clubs meet in the two villages. {LILLESHALL.}All clubs meet in either the{Youth Club,Playgroup Building or{The Memorial Hall. Cubs(Mon.) Guides(Wed.)Scouts(Mon.) Youth Club(Thur) Brownies (Mon.) Rangers(Fri.Fort).Keep fit(Mon.) Mum&Toddlers(Tue W.I(Tue Fort) Senior Citizens(Mon fort). {CHURCH ASTON.}The following clubs meet in either the the{Church Hall}or the {Village Hall. Brownies (Mon&Thurs)Jubilee Club(Wed fort)Wine circle(Mon monthly) Pitchcroft W.I(Wed monthly) Cubs(Thurs)Guides(Thurs)Scouts(Fri) Horticultural Soc.(Thurs Monthly) St.Andrews Women's Fellowship(Tues Monthly).
